text: I was very excited to try café Jeanne d'Arc but sadly was a bit disappointed.... The good points first: cool location on De Lorimier between des Carrières and Rosemont, great atmosphere and nice, cozy decor, friendly service. The latte I had wasn't the greatest nor was the grilled cheese but I will give it another shot next time, maybe it was an off-day.

Stumbled upon this sweet gastro cafe in Rosemont. Vibe is mellow grunge, with warm Montreal kitsch decor. The espresso I'm currently sipping is appropriately hot and bracingly bitter--a solid shot. The menu features grilled cheese and burgers, though there's a "weekend" menu (which looks thoughtful and fun) clearly aimed at Montreal's soft spot for brunch. I can't speak for the food, but if it's as good as the coffee and the ambiance, this place deserves the coveted fifth star that I can't give it without first having a bite here.

Génial petit café de quartier, je suis très heureuse de leur existence !
Situé au coin de deLorimier , juste un peu au sud du boulevard Rosemont, le café Jeanne d'arc détonne de par sa devanture artistique blanche et noire. L'intérieur est décoré avec une thématique biker.

Plusieurs petites tables remplissent l'espace, assez restreint. Les tables sont suffisamment loin les unes des autres pour ne pas qu'on s'y sente coincé, toutefois. Le menu déjeuner est alléchant et délicieux ! essayez le bagel MTL ! Le café filtre est à volonté, peu importe le temps que vous prendrez. Nous sommes restés sur place environ 2h pour y travailler et jamais on ne nous a fait sentir de trop, THUMBS UP ! Le wifi est gratuit ! et ils servent de la crème glacée... Mmm 

Merci Jeanne d'Arc, on se reverra !

I heard about this sweet spot from a lad in the neighbourhood and immediately passed by to check it out and grab a coffee since I'm rarely in that part of town. Friendly staff, delicious coffee, and warm atmosphere. They had three muffins maison which looked nice but I unfortunately had no appetite so didn't indulge. The lunch and brunch menu looked delicious so I'll have to pass by another time.
